body:
Hey guys, its been a LONG time for some of you! so hello, nice to (kind of) speak to you!

Anyway, for those who don't know, a while back, like 4 months ago and beyond, i used to record and upload YouTube videos revolving around Avicus.

Recently i made an official retirement from YouTube, following my Avicus retirement a few months ago, BUT the end to my OPTOBAT channel isn't the last of me.

If you enjoy/enjoyed my videos, you can see more of me on an even bigger channel!

Details:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jv5e6pVtyIE

title: My YouTube Future.

replies.body: Good luck with your new channel! :D

replies.body: thanks Porky, nice to see you and congrats on mod if i haven't said yet! :D
